price: Have they not pondered the Words [of Allah], or has there come to them what did not come to their forefathers?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarū al-qawla am jāahum mā lam yati ābāahumu al-awalīna
